text: The Amityville Horror is a 2005 American horror movie. It is a remake of the 1979 movie. Ryan Reynolds plays George Lutz. ChloÃ« Grace Moretz plays Chelsea Lutz. Melissa George plays Kathy Lutz. The movie is set on Amityville, Long Island, New York in 1974. It was filmed in Chicago. The movie received negative reviews from critics. However, it made over $108 million overall in the box office ==Other websites== * * * * ==References== Category:2005 horror movies Category:2000s movie remakes Category:American horror movies Category:American movie remakes Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies set in the 1970s
title: The Amityville Horror (2005 movie)
